ygData.subject: Re: Yipee
ygData.msgSnippet: ... just for the record: Lambent BrestPlate:  AC 20, +5 sta, +1 cha, +25 hp.  Wt. 5.8. Mithril Breastplate: AC 17, +15 Agl, +30 HP.  Wt. 10.0.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
> > I have to disagree on the Lambent BP vs Mithril BP. I get more AC and
>more
> > HP from the Lambent BP. My Agl is 100 btw (without the MBP).
>
> Well the hp isn't in question here. Clearly, one has an hp bonus
> and one doesnt. AC17 on the MithBP and AC20 on the LambentBP is
> what I'm referring too.
>
> I think we talked about this before. Every 10? AGI gives you some
> sort of AC bonus applied across all your armor? I don't remember.
> But if my 105 AGI drops to 99 AGI, I lose AC for sure. I'm willing
> to bet bumping my AGI to 110 will then increase the AC.
>
> So, does a +15 AGI increase/bump your overall armor up enough to make
> just +3 AC? If it does then the MithBP is equally as good as the
> Lambent one. (Not to mention the added AGI makes your combat effective-
> ness increase as well)
>
> If I followed all the numbers correctly, I still wouldnt wear the
> MithBP even if it was better =) Baby blue is for those wimpy paladins.
>
> Harmonic.
>

just for the record:
Lambent BrestPlate: AC 20, +5 sta, +1 cha, +25 hp. Wt. 5.8.
Mithril Breastplate: AC 17, +15 Agl, +30 HP. Wt. 10.0.
